title: Character Deep Dive
description: How well do you know the backstories and details?

questions.question: What is Zenitsu's greatest fear?
questions.explanation: Despite using Thunder Breathing, Zenitsu is terrified of thunder and lightning! The irony is intentional.

questions.question: Tanjiro has an exceptionally powerful sense of smell.
questions.explanation: Tanjiro can smell emotions, track demons, and even sense the 'opening thread' that reveals an enemy's weakness!

questions.question: Why does Inosuke always want to fight strong opponents?
questions.explanation: Inosuke is obsessed with being the strongest and constantly seeks to prove himself in battle!

questions.question: Who is Genya Shinazugawa's brother?
questions.explanation: Genya is Sanemi's younger brother. Their relationship is strained due to tragic family events involving their demon mother.

questions.question: Yoriichi Tsugikuni was born with the Demon Slayer Mark.
questions.explanation: Yoriichi was born with his mark, unlike others who must awaken it. He's the strongest demon slayer in history!

questions.question: What makes Mitsuri Kanroji's muscles special?
questions.explanation: Mitsuri has a unique muscle composition that's 8x denser than average, giving her superhuman flexibility and strength!

questions.question: What did Rengoku's father used to be?
questions.explanation: Shinjuro Rengoku was the former Flame Hashira who gave up fighting after learning about Sun Breathing's superiority.

questions.question: Muichiro Tokito and Yuichiro Tokito are twin brothers.
questions.explanation: Muichiro had a twin brother Yuichiro who was killed by a demon, which triggered Muichiro's awakening as a swordsman.
